name: Dog Hero and Demon King's Castle
name_original: Dog Hero and Demon King's Castle
description:
[Overview]

A hero is captured by succubus before he can even begin his journey,
and gets confined in the Succubus castle to be cum-squeezed.

In order to prevent any chance of escape, he is cursed, and constantly has a succubus holding onto him.

And with a variety of succubi inhabiting the castle, he gets cum-squeezed in an equal variety of ways...

30+ characters
H-scenes are all pixel-art animation!

[H Situations]

The hero, accompanied by a succubus, gets cum-squeezed by monsters all over the castle.
There are also many situations involving multiple succubi at once.
The hero is generally much smaller than the succubi, so he often get's buried in their breasts and asses.
